name: Student Council - Beta Version 0.01
description:
EARLY ACCESS: 

It's election day at your school and you must win. However, the odds aren't in your favor (and you suck at campaigning), so what lengths must you go in order to succeed? 

There are 3 paths in this game (so far). Please report all bugs and stuff to @artalogica on instagram or join the discord server: https://discord.gg/HBudZfc (or down in the comments) Thanks for beta testing! You guys are the best <3  

Btw there seem to be some bugs but not too game breaking XD I'm working on it
